content.question: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.Compare single-member districts in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries. In your response, you should do the following:Define the concept of “single-member districts.”Describe two different examples of single-member districts, each one used by a different AP Comparative Government and Politics course country.Explain how single-member districts promote different party systems for each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in (b).

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
